Make sure the title includes categorization (choose the one that best fits):
-  [Sprite]: If the PR is adding or changing sprites
-  [Variant]: If the PR is adding new variants
-  [Audio]: If the PR is adding or changing music/sfx
-  [UI/UX]: If the PR is changing images for UI/UX elements
-  [Animation]: If the PR is adding or changing animations
-  [Attribution]: If the PR is adding / changing attributions in REUSE.toml files
  - For new contributors, you may consider adjusting CREDITS.md in the main PokÃ©Rogue repo
-  [Dev]: If the PR is primarily changing something pertaining to development (service-worker.js, etc)
-  [GitHub]: For changes to GitHub workflows/templates/etc
-  [Misc]: If no other category fits the PR
-->

If your PR modifies or deletes existing keys that are currently in use,

## Checklist
- [ ] **I'm using `beta` as my base branch**
- [ ] I have provided **screenshots** proving my additions are properly working (if necessary).
- [ ] Have I provided a clear explanation of the changes?
- [ ] I have attached a link to a main repo PR or properly explained my changes as applicable.
- [ ] Have I provided screenshots/videos of the changes (if applicable)?
  - [ ] Have I made sure that any UI change works for both UI themes (default and legacy)?
- [ ] I have uncommented the appropriate warning message if necessary.
